sentences.sContent: I used to play dominoes there.
sentences.sCn: 我过去常在那里玩多米诺骨牌游戏。

synos.tran: 多米诺骨牌；面具；化装外衣

phrases.pCn: 多米诺效应（政治术语，指一事件引起连锁反应）

trans.tranCn: 多米诺骨牌；面具；化装外衣
trans.tranOther: one of a set of small flat pieces of wood, plastic etc, with different numbers of spots, used for playing a game
